      • getDrawableCompat

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDrawableCompat(android.content.Context $receiver,
                                                                   int resId)

        Returns a drawable object associated with a particular resource ID and styled for the current theme.

        Parameters:
        resId - Int The desired resource identifier, as generated by the aapt tool. This integer encodes the package, type, and resource entry. The value 0 is an invalid identifier.
        Returns:
        Drawable An object that can be used to draw this resource, or null if the resource could not be resolved.

      • getDrawableSelectorCompat

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDrawableSelectorCompat(android.content.Context $receiver,
                                                                           int normalColor,
                                                                           int pressedColor,
                                                                           int disabledColor,
                                                                           int res)

        Specifies a tint for drawable as a color state list.
